TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed QueueTransferProtocol extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Indicates the protocol to be used in transferring messages between queue managers.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Specifying Srmp or SrmpSecure when the UseActiveDirectory attribute is set to `true` will cause an exception because Message Queuing (MSMQ) does not provide for Active Directory addressing when using SRMP. UseActiveDirectory is an attribute on the [\<netMsmqBinding>](../Topic/%3CnetMsmqBinding%3E.md) and the [\<msmqIntegrationBinding>](../Topic/%3CmsmqIntegrationBinding%3E.md).
For more information about addressing queues, see [Service Endpoints and Queue Addressing](../Topic/Service%20Endpoints%20and%20Queue%20Addressing.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.QueueTransferProtocol Native = int32(0)
.field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.QueueTransferProtocol Srmp = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Use the Soap Reliable Messaging Protocol (SRMP).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.QueueTransferProtocol SrmpSecure = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Use the Soap Reliable Messaging Protocol Secure (SRMPS) transport.
